website_summaries.verdict: An attractive duvet cover design that is good quality for the cost.
pros: This style stands out for being wrinkle resistant, and some users give this solid praise for holding up well over time
Its beautiful appearance is another pro, and the instructions are easy to follow
cons: Poor fit and missing ties are among the occasional quality concerns expressed by some consumers

customer_reviews.title: Pitbull tested, pitbull approved
customer_reviews.text: It compliments Bella's fur perfectly. Also it's soft and has held up well over the last few months. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is poor quality, as one might expect for price point. However, it is definitely worse than others I have purchased in the past from other companies in similar price points. The button holes look like they will wear out after one or two more uses, the material is very thin and cheap feeling, and to top it all off both sides of the cover are different shades of brown (chocolate cover ordered). You can clearly tell that the 2 pieces of fabric stitched together to make each side are NOT the same color and one side is a brownish red color while the other is actually chocolate. Don’t waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimi

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions
customer_reviews.text: Dimensions (from the package label): King 104 x 90"; Queen 90 x 90"; Full 80 x 90"; Twin 68 x 90"; Calif King 104 x 98". I ordered the Cal King because I couldn't find any info about the dimensions and it turned out I needed a King, so I want everyone to be able to see the dimensions. The Duvet cover itself is great, and the King fits my comforter perfectly. The fabric is soft and comfortable and washes and dries well. I liked it so well I bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: The fabric teared  with the first wash - ONE Star
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy at first because it seemed soft and nice fabric. But at the FIRST time I washed it, it torn (as shown in the picture), using the gentle cycle of my washing machine with cold water. I would return it, but there's only one-month window return. Mine was definitely not as stated on the description "made of the highest quality double brushed microfiber strong linen for years to lasts". I would have rather spent a little more and purchase one that has better quality and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel T.

customer_reviews.title: Will discolored what’s underneath
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in December if 2017. This cover completely discolored the comforter that it was covering. The cover was washed several times before it was used. The ties are constantly coming undone, two button holes already ripped. Now I have a ripped cover and a comforter that looked awful because it is discolored. We are a pet free and smoke free home. Very disappointed as now I will need to replace both.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't the advertised color- was more a Salmon when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't the advertised color- was more a Salmon when I ordered Burgundy. Theres a difference between monitor and real life, I understand, however, burgundy and salmon are no where close to each other in color.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha McKee

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if people here are getting this product for free to write a good review but not only did it come with a black mark on it , it’s extremely see through cheap cheap material , returning !
customer_reviews.author: Carla Bello

customer_reviews.title: Good Product but Color is Not Accurate!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the soft fabric but the color is was off. I ordered teal but the fabric is actually a much lighter Aqua. The photos online don't match the actual products color.
customer_reviews.author: Brig

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, great price. For those complaining this this "comforter" isn't as advertised and is just a sheet...you read wrong. This isnt a comforter. It's a duvet. It's nothing more than a covering for an already existing comforter you have. You will not be receiving a blanket or a comforter, but essentially a large pillow case. I use mine with a down blanket I picked up at Macy's. It fits perfect and wasn't excruciatingly difficult to set up. It's extremely soft, great color. Def will order other colors to mix up decor per seasons.
customer_reviews.author: STaRSPRiNKLe

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible cover, did not fit King size comforter. Very dissappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite purchase from amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite purchase from amazon! I have a queen sized bed but I ordered a king duvet cover and duvet insert. It came in the mail super quick (even before the insert I ordered from another company on here) and it's so soft and cozy and I don't want to leave my bed! The picture attached is of a the cover WITH the insert I purchased SEPARATELY from the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bedding purchase available on Amazon!!
customer_reviews.text: I got the color Mocha, and I am absolutely in LOVE with this duvet set! I’d 100% order it again! They feel super luxurious and soft, and you can’t beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: lindy92

customer_reviews.title: Not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Being new to duvets, I bought this mainly for the very low price. I spent one night under it before sending it back. I thought I was going through a second round of menopause because of how hot and sweaty I got.....even in a cold room. After I returned it, I went with a 100% cotton which I'm very pleased with. If breathability is not an issue with you, it will probably make you happy. It laid smooth, was very soft to the touch, and easy to insert the comforter inside of.
customer_reviews.author: River Girl

customer_reviews.title: Dark stains & poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this duvet for my master bedroom. When I took it out of the package, I noticed It had little stains all over it. I returned it for a replacement and again, the same stains were on the second one I received. Really disappointed because the matieral is as soft as the other reviewers say. UPDATE: going from 2 stars to 1 because this duvet is such poor quality. I’ve had it less than a month and it already has holes and rips.
customer_reviews.author: heidi

customer_reviews.title: Could be softer, but generally good
customer_reviews.text: This is a good, affordable, decent quality cover. I have never bought covers/sheets etc. before so I bought this as something mid-range. Admittedly I expected it to be softer and cooler feeling, but this isn't bad. For the price I really can't complain. There are ties on the 4 corners for securing down your comforter and clear buttons on the bottom to shut the cover. I've had these covers for a few months and have gone through a half dozen washes with no visible fading. Overall this is a great cover for the money. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Tan

customer_reviews.title: What a bummer.
customer_reviews.text: The cover is soft, but it did not come with strings to tie to the duvet and a pillow case has a stain. I don't know if the stain was already there because I opened it up and threw it all in the wash. I took it out of the dryer, put the pillow case on my bed and there it was. It looks like oil? I'm not sure. I have bought a duvet from this brand before and liked it. This time around has been very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Brieanna

customer_reviews.title: So Worth It - So Comfy - Dog Approved
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the most comfortable cover I have ever owned. I look forward to falling asleep every night under this beauty, it's the perfect weight for all temps. I would highly recommend this item if you are in the market for a new duvet cover. I own two pitties and they absolutely love it as well. There is little to no hair that's left behind either and this was a huge perk for me as all other comforters I have owned in the past collected dog hair like crazy, NOT this one!!! I will definitely purchase this product again when I am in the market for a new duvet cover.
customer_reviews.author: J.Tollefson

customer_reviews.title: SUPER Soft & Good for Hot Sleepers
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with this duvet cover. The color is nice, and it’s SUPER soft. My fiancé and I are hot sleepers and this on our duvet is perfect for keeping us cool and comfortable. My only complaint is that the buttons to secure the cover are kind of hard to button/unbutton. If you are arthritic or struggle with tasks like this I’d steer clear of this cover and opt for one with a zipper. Additionally, I wish it had a couple more tie-downs on the inside for securing the duvet insert so it doesn’t slide around. That being said, we really haven’t had any issues if the duvet sliding around or anything. All in all happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Great, until you wash it
customer_reviews.text: Shame, I really loved this duvet cover. It was soft, perfect color and really was everything I expected... until I washed it. Washed just as ordered on the tag, cold machine wash, tumble dry on low heat, yep, same as literally everything else I own. But the material MELTED... cool, now I have to begin the search all over again.
customer_reviews.author: Glamournaut

customer_reviews.title: Totally Different Color :(
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and light. Really wanted to love this BUT it's nowhere near the pictured color. My orange is actually vibrant red. Totally different shade. Also, one of the button holes came sew shut. Bad quality control. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: All Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is basically two sheets stitched together with buttons on the bottom to hold it on your comforter. I was specifically looking at one like this because there was no design on it, but that is not a good deciding factor in buying this. The duvet is also too small for a king. Where the buttons are on the bottom just has the blanket stuffed into it and it's bunched up. It's not worth my time to send it back. 10/10 would not buy again or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Lepore

customer_reviews.title: Super soft...WRONG color.
customer_reviews.text: I will give it to Nestle that their product is pretty amazingly soft, however, I ordered the eggplant purple and received a dark grey (which is super annoying) Literally, NO-ONE wants to deal with the returning process after waiting patiently for their item to be delivered and have to turn around and wait again. I am using the grey one - which looks nice, but not cute like the purple would look. Also, the micro-fiber material is SUPER hot. I have been sweating so bad at night. It will be nice in the winter time. Just be AWARE that you may order a color you like and open your package to find out this company is obviously illiterate.
customer_reviews.author: Mommarae

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time/$
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This duvet took me 10 minutes to put on because it lacks ties on each corner. It only came with two ties on one side and they're too short to be useful. Cheap, thin material was hard to manage with my comforter insert, and it has way too many buttons to close. I regret making this purchase and will return it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Emile

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this duvet set simply because of the color. It is more vivid in the picture. I still love it a lot. What I do not like this the fact that the cover doesn’t have a zipper it’s truly so weird how I have to make a tie and hope that my comforter stays in place. I accidentally got chocolate on it the other day ( melted KitKat bar) the stain was truly annoying to get out so I think be more careful With this type of material. I honestly don’t think this is worth the money, I owed better softer from ikea etc. So I’m not miserable over it but I wouldn’t make another purchase.
customer_reviews.author: alisa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Discolored After First Wash
customer_reviews.text: I pre-washed this according to the care directions with a hypo-allergenic/clear detergent before placing it on my bed. After one wash, spotting appeared on both sides of the cover and it is now damaged. I knew that this item was cheap, but it wasn't even worth the hassle of putting on my comforter. Unfortunately, it took me about 20 mins to put it together with my comforter, and I did not notice the spotting until I had completely made my bed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Echo Luna

customer_reviews.title: WRITING ON OUTSIDE OF DUVET
customer_reviews.text: Bought this duvet based on great reviews, but was shocked to see that there was random writing on it. I wouldnt mind it if it was on the inside, but the outside?? Friends ask me what it is, and I have no answer. Tried washing it, but no luck. If you purchase this item, dont be surprised if it has this. I DONT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Nestl Navy Blue Duvet Cover
customer_reviews.text: I bought this duvet because I love the color and because it matches the color of my bedroom lamps! (It’s all about a completed look in the bedroom!) And the buttons! Much better than a zipper, I think! Don’t have to worry about the zipper breaking or catching the comforter material. The buttons are a much better fastener. The only thing the keeps me from giving 5 stars overall is the fact that I have a king sized bed and the duvet is a little lacking covering the bed side to side. Covers from top to bottom quite well but side to side, perhaps 3 to 4 inches more would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn S.

customer_reviews.title: Waited almost 4 months to write a review. Don’t hesitate!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this cover and pillow cases for a few months and I love them. I wash everything at least once a week and the buttons have held up with no problems. My only issue is with one of the pillow cases, the stitching did come out on the bottom half....obviously not ideal but I do believe it’s because it got caught on something in the washer, not an actual quality issue. Color is great, very soft. Would 100% recommend, currently buying the soft blue color as well. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Dirty sheets!!!
customer_reviews.text: So, granted, i took a chance on these sheets. Some reviews were absolutely wonderful and some were terrible. I hate to say i had to add to the terrible. Look these sheets are cheap, and as a result they are not thick, in fact they are really thin. But ok, they are soft to the feel so i figured, hey that's ok. Just opened up the package though and blimey, black stains everywhere, on those white sheets. And wrinkle free?? Not at all, i would say, smart packaging to make them appear wrinkle free but thats about it. So returned they will be. Just such an annoying hassle though. I guess we will remember that brand name as no good...
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: Color is pretty different than what was shown in description
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft and comfortable it is, however, the color that I thought I had purchased was pretty different than what was delivered to me. I ordered light baby blue, I got back a bright mint green? To better describe, if you've ever seen the lighter aqua-green color that surgeons wear at the hospital, this is the color that it reminded me of. It's definitely more mint green than baby blue. So I'm a bit disappointed. Looking back at the product and its description, when I click on light baby blue, the picture does show a much lighter color than the one that delivered today.
customer_reviews.author: Yen Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Truly Impressed With Quality For Price
customer_reviews.text: I don't always write reviews, but when I do, I make them count. I've had all difference shapes, sizes, and textures of duvet and I can honestly say this one is top notch hotel quality. Now, I'm not talking about cheap hotels or even mediocre hotels. I'm talking lush, extravagant, resort-type duvet cover. So soft. So easy to put on (I recommend the burrito method found on YouTube). Truly impressed with the quality for the price. I bought two for our king and will be buying more for each of our guest rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis S.

customer_reviews.title: I've seen a lot of accurate 5 star reviewed items from Amazon but this is not one of them.
customer_reviews.text: It's nice enough as a set for guests but may not hold up for daily use. It realized the product never said what material it's made from but it's definitely not 100% cotton. A little "polyester" look to it, which makes it look a little "cheap". But I guess that's what makes it wrinkle free and soft. Also some of the stitching have threads dangling at the seems. I've seen a lot of accurate 5 star reviewed items from Amazon but this is not one of them. After some usage I think it's better than my first impression of it so I changed it from 3 stars to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: dsliang9

customer_reviews.title: Soft and well made!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised. I purchased the camel gold and it's just a bit darker than pictured. I posted the photo without any filter so you can see the color. The fabric is so so soft! I kept reading about that and am so glad it was legit! For thirty dollars this is an amazing product. All of the buttons were perfectly fine and it's only one side that buttons, the rest is sewn together which I love ( i put the button side at the end of the bed.)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: comforter will not stay put and slips around
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is wonderful. I had problems keeping my comforter in place inside the duvet. I fastened it at the corners, but the comforter balled up inside. Solved the problem by sewing the side seams all around but it still bunched up. Finally stitched through the center to keep it in place...now it is a permanently attached duvet, but it is soooooo soft, I am happy with that. The pillow sham is from the same soft fabric and feels so welcoming at night, I don't take it off except to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So so quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s a soft, functional duvet. I liked the buttons, and ties. What I didn’t like was finding not one, but two tears along the seams. I kept the duvet, because I can sew. I liked that there weren’t seams throughout the design of duvet, so if my dog scratches at it, it won’t easily tear. Just wish it was sewn better at seams.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Came with weird smell????
customer_reviews.text: So I just receive the product very excited to change my duvet sheet and I discover the new sheets have a weird smell??? So I will have to try to give it a go in the wash machine I've bought stuff like this in the past I never really encounter smells like that but it is pretty soft and the color is accurate so I will just have to see till after. OK so after I wash it the ties begin to completely break apart??? It supposedly come with 3 ties that you can tie around your comforter but it breaking apart....added photo for reference
customer_reviews.author: Zhou

customer_reviews.title: Held up nicely
customer_reviews.text: 3 years ago I scored a deal on down comforters. I gave them along with these duvet covers as Christmas gifts to the young adults in my family. This year we were talking about past gifts and everyone commented on how they loved the duvets. They have held up well with dog, cats and laundry abuse. The comforters didn't fare as well but the duvets are still super soft and comfortable. It surprised me as I didn't expect much at this price point. I'm back now to but myself one!
customer_reviews.author: kkgotchall

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Washed it once it arrived, came out wrinkle free, ties made it nice to hold the duvet in place, very soft, have had it a few weeks and still lays nice with no wrinkles. Paired it with a mustard/gold colored kaleidoscope quilt I found on amazon and Opalhouse sheets with gold print from Target. It’s my first matching bed set and I did it for around $150 (including 4 king size pillows). I am very happy with this purchase, would buy again in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal, Great Price, and Great Service.
customer_reviews.text: The color is lovely. The material is very soft, and it has these nifty ties in each corner for holding down a down comforter. The best part was the have directions on how to put the cover on. I've had Duvet covers before, and always ended wresting the comforter in all awkwardly, and it had weird bumpy spots. I followed the directions they provided, and success the comforter slid in perfectly with no lumps.
customer_reviews.author: Librarian

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s very soft and light weight. I like it a lot. This is the 4th one I’ve bought. I’ve bought one for each of my guest rooms and this is the second one I’ve bought for my master. I previously had a darker gray and decided to go for a lighter color. I really love this light gray!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Manion

customer_reviews.title: Well made Duvet
customer_reviews.text: This is made very well and easy to put on. The material is very soft to touch. The only problem was the color. I ordered Teal and color on screen looked like the teal I needed (teal more toward the blues) but it was more Aquamarine (Greenish) than teal so it clashed with my room I did not return it , because my daughter need a duvet cover and she like the color and her room is light grey so it gave her a splash of color. I would recommend this and would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: I never knew what Duvets were until now, and now I can't live without it.
customer_reviews.text: I never knew what Duvets were until now, and now I can't live without it. This transforms your bed into a hotel quality bed, because this is what hotels use. And here I was, thinking my whole life, that hotels had special comforters, naw, they have duvets. That's it. Thank you lady from video that explains the duvet. I hope she has an endless supply of duvets, she deserves it. lol
customer_reviews.author: LOUI5

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a duvet cover in a different color and loved it so much that I purchased another one. I washed it and put my quilt inside and saw that there were some irregularities in the fabric. I emailed the address on the packaging that it came in rather than going through Amazon. I have never experienced such PHENOMENAL CUSTOMER SERVICE as I did with this experience. I received an email back in less than 24 hours and the issue was resolved immediately. The company sent me a new replacement and didn’t even require that I send back the defective merchandise. I do love this duvet cover for its softness, comfort & it also washes beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: I bought the silver grey in King size. Its not the fault of the cover that my husband and I took so long to stuff it that we both were frustrated. I am very pleased with this 3 piece set. I'm using the shams as pillowcases and they are soft and comfortable. The cover has four ties to secure the duvet. If it had six the comforter wouldn't shift about. Overall I'm very happy with the set. It's not wrinkle free but I used it straight out of packaging and the wrinkling is minimal. I like how it looks as it creates a soft fluffy look on my otherwise rigid looking bed. And the price is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Akin

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality fabric. Cheap in price and quality
customer_reviews.text: *After two weeks of use the cover has many thread pulls and snags. There are no animals in the house and it hasn't been washed. If you need a very cheap cover, it may do fine. Not quality. The fabric is very thin, much thinner than a typical cotton sheet, which makes me wonder if it will tear or easily rip. The duvet being so thin means it gives no structure to the down insert so you can see the seems of the insert, not a clean look. The cream/beige color is not a buttery cream but more of a khaki cream which I liked.
customer_reviews.author: cdiesel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed this time.
customer_reviews.text: Normally, I would give an awesome review for this. We have purchased a few duvet covers from this company over the past few years. The last one we got was a deep black. This one we purchased, its a faded black, like it was worn in and washed many times. I didn't return it because I had already washed it before use but washed in cold and once on gentle cycle so that definitely wouldn't make it fade. The other one purchased previous to this one has been washed aton in hot water and hasn't faded. We got a bigger comforter so needed a bigger duvet. So, guess the color will be hit and miss.
customer_reviews.author: The Ogburns

customer_reviews.title: Quality control leaves more to be desired
customer_reviews.text: Quality control was poor. I reordered this duvet cover (Dec 2019) and the stitching along the buttons was pulled. As a result I cant button any of my duvet comforter off without tearing more threads. I had ordered this duvet cover a few years ago with no issue. Ill also add I had not washed it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Cons

customer_reviews.title: Very Soft, Great Color
customer_reviews.text: I got this duvet, and put it over an existing comforter that I already have (teal and white chevron pattern). As you can see, there is no indication of the pattern or color showing through. The duvet cover is super soft and seems durable. In my photo, I had literally just taken it out and put it on the bed, so it is pretty wrinkly. The navy is a beautiful color. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It will do the job
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these are not wrinkle free, it does have a nice sheen to them. It’s more like a satin cotton look, and they are soft. but I thought that they were going to be more velvety.And I thought the color was going to be a little lighter. The picture shows that they are slightly velvety in texture and they are not. this is for my eight-year-old sons room, I don’t know about how I feel about the value for my money🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Christina S Kemply

customer_reviews.title: Great price, color true
customer_reviews.text: TL;DR: Color accurate to photo, size perfect Color is great- rather accurate to the picture. (I bought the Taupe Sand in Cal King). This seriously is super duper soft. I didn't use to be a microfiber fan, but this modern fabric has brought me over to the dark side from cotton. It washes well and seems to fluff the wrinkles out relatively easily. It looked to have no quality defects upon initial inspection, but I'll update if it happens to have a failure. I found it challenging to find a California King duvet and cover that wouldn't break the bank, but this one paired iwht this duvetfit the bill and works great for our usage.
customer_reviews.author: Casey KTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I’ve purchased two
customer_reviews.text: This is my first duvet and it works for me. I like the option for buttons because I didn’t want to mess with a zipper. The material itself is soft and is holding up after multiple washes. I purchased a second one after I had owned the first for awhile and I have to say that I’m pleased with the product. However, if someone wants a fancy duvet this isn’t it, but if you need a duvet for simple reasons this one is perfect. For example, I purchased it because my dogs like to lay on the bed during the day and it was a pain to wash a huge comforter all of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, hit or miss on the color
customer_reviews.text: This duvet cover and pillowcase set is very soft, the material feels pretty sturdy (for pets) but is very cool. My only complaint is the color match. It really looks different from what I was hoping for and doesn't go with the color of my room. The pictures I saw seemed to compliment the room color but in real life it clashes. I'm thinking of getting another color in hopes that it looks better because I do love the material. My queen comforter fit perfectly inside and, although it didn't have any buttons or loops to tie the strings onto, it's stayed in place nicely without twisting or falling.
customer_reviews.author: MLupher

customer_reviews.title: Great great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I like my duvet cover A LOT! Great deal!! I was looking for a soft duvet cover that's soft and good quality (without breaking the bank). I was looking at ones double and triple the price of this one. And I just decided to go with this one and check it out. I don't need to look any further. I'd rather get 2 of these and rotate through them to wash and keep clean. Why would I want 1 super expensive one when I can have this one? It's super soft, wrinkle free. It feels warm (which I love, some who tend to get hot easily at night might not like that but I do).
customer_reviews.author: SMyle

customer_reviews.title: Duvet Stays in Place, Easy to Put On, LOVELY Fabric!
customer_reviews.text: We like this set so much that we bought matching sheets. The fabric feels great and it has a subtle sheen. I know fabric well and this is a solid winner. Also, we ordered the wrong size at first and, just a few weeks before Christmas were astounded when Nestl's customer service contacted us within hours of our email. They were engaged, wrote well and cared. Very impressive. We were so impressed we ordered the matching sheets! The whole package has created a true nest in our bedroom. Pretty, comfortable and it washes wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product but received a used/returned set!
customer_reviews.text: Received my product today with no issues, shipping was fast and exactly as advertised. I was super excited since this was my first time ever getting a duvet insert and duvet cover. Unfortunately, the duvet cover came with a few stains that I didn't see until after I washed it twice. Kinda bummed out that it wasn't brand new like I thought it was. The pillow shams that came with it were fine. I'll try soaking with it a stain remover like Shout or something and give an update on it. Don't really wanna deal with the hassle of returning and shipping it back out. Such a shame! Maybe this was one is a million that slipped through quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's my imagination, but this is the BEST comforter cover I have EVER owned!!....It is lightweight but not cheaply made. The ties inside keep your comforter secure. The material is soft to the touch and believe it or not I sleep BETTER! For the cost it cant be beat. I am VERY happy with my choice and if I had an excuse I would buy more of these just to have a backup. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Gyorgyi

customer_reviews.title: On today’s episode how cheap is too cheap ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading description I was under impression I’d be getting decent product, somewhat quality made. None of it happened. It made of cheap synthetic fabric, poorly made. It’s extremely thin and would fall apart even before your first wash at most delicate settings on your washer. No, it doesn’t feel good neither it looks. In my title I’m referring to cheap, not meaning pricing of this “item”, which is way high, but rather to overall quality and impression I’ve got.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: No Buyers Remorse
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased two different duvets - one from Amazon Basics and one from Nestl. The pink duvet from Nestl is much darker than the stock picture entails. Which is fine, it’s still a true pink, just not as bright as I had thought. The $20 navy blue Amazon Basics duvet and the $30 pink Nestl duvet are pretty much the same quality/softness, but I prefer the zipper closure on my Amazon Basics duvet. Overall, I don’t have buyers remorse. I wish the Nestl was more affordable because the quality is so close to Amazon Basics, but I do appreciate the color options!
customer_reviews.author: TheCrowFamily

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for the softest and fluffiest comforter for the longest time and finally found it!!! This easily compares to what the luxury hotels use on their beds. Pair this duvet with a goose down alternative. I purchased the Utopia Bedding comforter insert. You never want to get out of those beds and always wonder what they use! Well, THIS IS IT!!! Softest, coolest/warmest and for the best price ever!!! Would definitely recommend and buy this again. Also, this finally covered our Cal/King bed on all sides!! Everything from the home stores is too small or off on the dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Barcena

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft Nut Dog Owners Beware
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the softest duvets I’ve ever felt. We were hoping to just use the duvet without a filler in it for the summer since we live in the south and it gets hot but you definitely need a comforter in the duvet or it looks like a sheet on your bed. Also, if you have a big dog and it gets on your bed, beware. Our dog stretched out and her pads have caused pulls in the fabric. That seems like it would happen with any type of fabric but we never had the issue with our last duvet cover. Overall though it’s a good buy and super soft!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Larkin

customer_reviews.title: Best Covers For The Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these duvet covers for our “linen spa down alternative comforters.” Let me just say these are hands down the best duvet covers that you can get for the price. My husband and I have these on our bed as well as our son and our daughter and we all love them. Prior to using them I put them on a quick wash and ran them through the dryer to get the wrinkles out and they looked beautiful. They are super comfortable and the fabric is super soft. I have 2 cats and the pet hair does not stick as well, which is always a plus! I would definitely recommend and purchase again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Who owns king size pillows for real?
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these except the price and the color - rust orange was much more on the brown side than I would have expected but this thing is SOFT AS HELL. oh and the shams are king size when purchasing the king size duvet (I have no doubt I overlooked this detail, just throwing it out there) but honestly who has king size pillows? Do those even exist? And why? I have washed and dried this bad boy 2 times already and there was a tiny bit of shrinkage but still sooooooo friggin soft and color remained unchanged (unfortunately for me)
customer_reviews.author: Kpurry

customer_reviews.title: It's okay I suppose -- not pet approved as it says though, I don't think!
customer_reviews.text: This duvet cover is decent for price, it is super soft. But, because it is so soft it picks up a bunch of lint, hair, random debris, etc etc.... you name it. So it requires a lot more washing than I'd like. Which for me, just means it looks dirty throughout the week until I wash it. Maybe it would be better if it weren't white -- but if you like to sleep in a cloud like me, and are looking for an easy white duvet, I'd try something with a different fabric. It is fairly wrinkle-free, and very soft. Will be great if you're looking to purchase a color! :)
customer_reviews.author: kinser

customer_reviews.title: SO soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is so soft, not quite like a jersey cotton but similar, just thinner. The insides of the duvet cover have ties to make sure your duvet doesn't slide around which is great! My only wish is that there was a zipper rather than a button closure, hence the 4-star review; the buttons aren't sewn on all that well and every time I wash it I'm afraid they're going to pop off (so far so good, thankfully) and are also spaced a little too far apart... but at this price point I really can't complain too much!
customer_reviews.author: morgandawnn

customer_reviews.title: Misleading pictures/ description
customer_reviews.text: The description says one thing and the picture shows another. I wanted a orangish color so when I was looking through the pictures I came across the "mocha light brown" I was like oh brown no I dont want that but the picture showed a really pretty orange color, so I was like well maybe it wont be the brown sense it has a orangish brown color picture. I was wrong. W hmm en it got to me the picture and description did not match. All though amazon was helpful with getting my money back it's just frustrating that the pictures and descriptions dont match!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Soft and super comfy
customer_reviews.text: We recently got a new king size down comforter, and wanted a duvet cover that would not be too thick and/or heavy. After scrutinizing dozens of items here on Amazon I settled on this one. Very happy I did, as we totally I LOVE it! Super soft, fine microfiber type material, easy to put on, and it washes up well. It doesn’t add a significant weight to the blanket and makes it feel like a cuddly cloud of coziness. I’ve only washed in cold water but dried on medium heat with no apparent issues so far (two washes). Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: lisamarie

customer_reviews.title: Great Color
customer_reviews.text: I got the orange and the color is even better than I expected. It’s more of a burnt orange which is exactly the look I was going for. It’s so soft and I’ve washed it twice so far with no issues, just some of the threads on the tie part are coming loose. I’m a little worried about the material in the long run because it feels a little bit cheap and seems like it will be very unforgiving to any type of mark or stain. But otherwise it was a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Tayler

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for my old duvet cover. It was stained and I wanted a new one. This one is thin and after a couple washes now has little fuzz balls all over it. If you are looking for something very thin, this may work for you but was not what I wanted at all. Now it has those scratchy fuzz balls on it and I don't use it all.
customer_reviews.author: justme

customer_reviews.title: Thin material, but soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I had a gorgeous duvet cover on my bed before. When it finally wore out and needed to be replaced, I had a hard time finding something that would go with the antique damask wallpaper. I searched for ages and finally decided to get an inexpensive solid color duvet cover while I continue to look for something nicer. This duvet cover is soft and comfortable to sleep with. However, the material is thin and doesn't look very good on the bed. It looks cheap. I understand that it's not a high-end item, and will be purchasing something nicer to replace it. But if you need something inexpensive and soft, this will do.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Espy

customer_reviews.title: good quality but not for sharing with pets
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and good quality. However, if you have shedding pets that sleep with you; this probably isnt the best duvet for you. I found that dog hair sticks to this material like a magnet. Not the company's fault, just a warning to pet owners.
customer_reviews.author: Mariee

customer_reviews.title: No wrinkles!  And Soft!
customer_reviews.text: I just washed my duvet for the first time and I am pleased to say it came out of the dryer wrinkle free! I spent a lot of time researching on Amazon to find the best product by comparing reviews. So far I think I got what I paid for. We will see how it holds up to use. I am using this duvet on a comforter for a bed being used for guests in our Airbnb. It will get a lot of use, so I hope it will last and not have any issues for at least a year. I think my guests will love the soft feel.
customer_reviews.author: landofoz

customer_reviews.title: Best Quality Best Price
customer_reviews.text: I waited to review these because I’ve had purchase so many different sets of bedding, from cheap to expensive and they had fallen apart after use. Almost a year in and lots and lots of washes, I am happy to report that these have held up! What a great buy! The price is absolutely wonderful. I bleach mine and haven’t experienced not one tear or color change. These will now be my go to.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Very soft out of 10
customer_reviews.text: Love seeing all these happy pooches in these review pics! All I got is an avocado but he looks pretty dang happy, so good enough. Listen, this thing is kinda wrinkly after the washing and drying business, but who cares? It’s soft, it’s really good quality for the price in my opinion, and it’s pretty easy to put on! Just do yourself a favor and get a real nice fluffy comforter (I recommend an alternative down one from the good ol’ Bed Bath & Beyond) and throw this bad boy on there and experience softville, home of some who cares about em wrinkles. Then get yourself and avocado or a dog :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and nice quality for price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my duvet cover set for about a month now and I love it. It fits my duvet perfectly, and ties to the corners to keep it in place. I like that it buttons, so I don’t have to worry about a broken zipper down the road. This cover is really warm paired with my down alternative duvet. Usually my dogs have no problem putting holes in my sheets and blankets, so far my duvet cover is winning! No holes yet! For the price you can’t beat it. I will be purchasing another.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nice, comfortable and very affordable
customer_reviews.text: Review date March 2020: You cannot go wrong purchasing this duvet cover for under 30 bucks. It fits a queen down comforter very well. It has corner tie downs so you can anchor the comforter at each corner so it will not drift in the cover. The material is soft and the thickness is like a 600 count flat sheet. The stitching looked like it was done well and the thread that was used did not shrink causing the material to pucker after two washes and machine drying. If it lasts for a couple of years, it was money well spent. My daughter just loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryoshi

customer_reviews.title: Good quality duvet cover.  Very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to find a reasonably priced duvet cover for a full/double bed. We had a queen sized cover but it just did not fit well. The Nestle Bedding duvet cover is a full size & fits well. It's soft and comfortable. I was impressed by the included instructions on how to actually get it over our duvet. It was such a struggle to figure out how to do it when we got the other cover. But the instructions helped--still took 2 of us to get it right. The price for this cover was pretty incredible. It was much lower than all the others we'd looked at. But it's a good quality and we're very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Rossignol

customer_reviews.title: Softest, functional, life saving beautiful duvet:))
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the soft feel and lilac grey color. Adore. And the two pillow cases were a surprise and so happy about them. Best purchase. So happy that i randomly decided to buy this. Note: the strings that tie the comforter inside are LIFESAVING. I had bought a pottery barn duvet years ago and omg the comforter would keep falling inside the duvet and i was bad at making it better every single mormimg (such a chore!!). I truly will never buy an overpriced duvet ever again, no joke. ❤️❤️ TY to the producers of this set. You guys did really well :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my weighted blanket, that just covers the very top of the bed and looked out of place, it fits inside the duvet cover with quite a bit overhang obviously, I just didn't tie it inside or button the bottom of the duvet. It is SUPER SOFT and comfortable. The grey is a nice dark grey, I enclosed pictures next to my dark grey blackout curtains, some throw pillows and a throw blanket with different greys for color comparisons. It's not wrinkle free and I find myself adjusting it every time I walk by, but that might just be the OCD in me...looks good, feels good, and the price was GREAT! I say buy it!
customer_reviews.author: My 2 Cents

customer_reviews.title: Great duvet cover, great color, just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: I got this duvet cover as a back up for by bed set so I wouldn’t have to strip my bed and wash it and if it didn’t dry or wash in time I would have something to sleep on. The cover is breathable and fits great and the color holds well and does not fade after washing and the color is just like on the picture which I’m really happy with. Most of the time it is wrinkle free just make sure you take it out of the dryer when it’s hot because if you let it cool down in there it will wrinkle
customer_reviews.author: RDS

customer_reviews.title: SUPER SOFT
customer_reviews.text: This duvet is very soft and light weight. The color is bright white. It's thin so you will want to use a white comforter with it. It came with corner ties to prevent the comforter insert from slipping. My only issue is that the bottom insert area of the duvet expands the entire length so the corner of the comforter pokes out. Most duvets stop several inches from the corner to prevent this from happening. A few stitches will solve the problem. We use it as our main covering so we are very happy with how soft and wrinkle free it is. For the price, it's a WIN!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price.
customer_reviews.text: So we bought this duvet to keep from having to wash our bulky comforter as much because we have two dogs that shed and our washer is not big enough for the comforter. Little did we know this was going to actually be an awesome purchase. Aside from the fact that it was practical and we needed a duvet so we could clean dog hair more easily this one was actually really nice quality and is holding up great again staff their toenails and playing ect. Also, it looks REALLY nice and made our bedroom look so much nicer and more put together. We love this.
customer_reviews.author: kodi_ko3

customer_reviews.title: Super soft - I love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this set in yellow and I loved it more than I thought I would! I bought it to brighten up my small bedroom in order to make it feel bigger, and because I was bored with my old color scheme. The standard yellow is a softer color than it appears online, which I ended up really liking. It brightens up the room without being too loud. I LOVE how soft to the touch it is. I didn’t even realize how rough my old duvet cover felt until I got this one. Really helps ya feel extra snuggly at bedtime haha. Next time I feel like switching the color, I’ll be ordering from this same line.
customer_reviews.author: A S

customer_reviews.title: Great except for stains that look like it’s wet in spots.
customer_reviews.text: It’s very soft and seems like nice quality, but after removing from the dryer there appeared to be wet spots, but we later realized that they were stains. My daughter didn’t check before putting it in the washer so I don’t know if they were on there before but I have never had this problem with anything else coming out of my washing machine. My daughter just got this for her birthday and didn’t want me to bother with the return process of having to send it back after redecorating her room.
customer_reviews.author: Dmvp0920

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Update: BEST PURCHASE EVER. If you have dogs like I do, you will love this. I have already washed it twice and the hair and stains came off like magic. It’s also very easy to take on an put back on. It takes a bit because of the buttons but i still love it. I really love this comforter/duvet. I was expecting it to be a little darker but as you can see in my photo it’s a little lighter than the photo but it still worked for me. It’s so soft and so cozy. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Magali

customer_reviews.title: Nice soft duvet covers but the edge cords came off after a few washes
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 sets of these that I frequently wash and use for my airbnb location. Many guests have looked the softness of these duvet covers. In about 4 months, most of the tying cords at the 4 ends of this cover either came off from the corner or the threads in the cord came undone. So I had to stitch in new cords. The duvet covers I had purchased earlier in the year had the size mentioned on the tag as King/queen.... The duvet covers I purchased later in the year had the actual size on the tag like 88x88. My preference is the sizes being mentioned as king/queen/Full/Twin on the tag
customer_reviews.author: Rekha

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: For a affordable as this is you get what you pay for. It’s pretty thin and the stitching feels like it won’t last long. It works for now and it’s pretty soft and wrinkle free even after washing and drying. I wish it had stronger ties. They are definitely VERY cheap and held on by two stitches. I wish there was one in the middle. I have a king so I improvised and used the button on the bottom to attach in the middle. Doesn’t help on the top though. All in all good enough for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Awful color
customer_reviews.text: Product is okay for the price point, though buttons are a bit loose. The big disappointment is the color. The cream didn't look too bad straight out of package but once on the bed and paired with my burlap pillows and bedscarf with a cream colored background, this duvet had a very apricot undertone. Looks horrible. I really thought something called cream would be safe. I there packaging away prematurely as it was trash day and I thought it'd be okay initially. Guess I'm out 28$.
customer_reviews.author: B. June Steele

customer_reviews.title: Silver is more of a sea foam green
customer_reviews.text: These are really soft sheets and I wanted to love them. I ordered them in silver to go with my grey sheets and curtains. The color is way off though. If anything, I'd say they look more like a sea foam green. It doesn't go with the rest of our room at all. Be cautious if looking for a true silver.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon C

customer_reviews.title: Sheer polyester duvet
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty bummed with how sheer this duvet is. My comforter has a few stripes on it and the duvet shows them. When I ordered it I didn't realize it was polyester because I specifically typed cotton duvet into the search and didnt read the title of the item. The material is not very durable either and stains really easy. I have 2 kids that play on my bed and I always find small hand prints after. I never had an issue like this with cotton duvets. I will definitely not be buying this again. I would have returned it but I missed my window.
customer_reviews.author: PrinKuBas

customer_reviews.title: Seriously cozy and worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted to update my room without paying too much. I just put this cover right over the king sized comforter and pillows I already had and it fit perfect. It’s such a soft fabric and is super comfortable. I dressed it up with a throw blanket and some accent pillows I already had and it looks great. Some wrinkles in the packaging but nothing a quick throw in the dryer couldn’t handle. There were some chalk marks where the buttons were sewn on, but that was to mark for the seamstress where to put them and didn’t bother me. I’d recommend washing it on a gentle cycle on its own, but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am a bedding snob on a budget. I don't want to spend gobs of money on stuff, but i am picky. This thing is so comfortable and soft, I love it. I was also surprised that I love the little ties in the bottom corners so much, as they keep the comforter in place inside the duvet. The buttons are easy to close, and they stay closed! I have washed it a couple of times already, and it has stayed soft and has not pilled. I would definitely buy this again, or for the guest bed, when the time comes. Now if I could only find the perfect sheets that don't cost a fortune!
customer_reviews.author: MosiToes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, soft duvet
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, gorgeous color, vibrant! I love the duvet, had to watch a how to video to figure it out, but WOW. Talk about a good deal! Fits my California King bed perfectly. This is my first duvet, and I honestly thought it was a comforter. I love the product. Git looks great. I'll upload a picture later.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is sooo worth it! I washed it as soon as I got it and put it on my comforter, I have now slept in it about 3 times with no wrinkles!! It is super soft and I feel like it even helps me sleep better from all the comfort. I would 10/10 recommend buying this if you are looking for a cover for your comforter. Not only is it super soft, It is easy to put on and easy to take off for washing. Really good price.
customer_reviews.author: Adonna

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. I washed it before using and it came out of the dryer without shrinking and even softer than when I took it out of the package. This is perfect for my full/queen lightweight duvet. The only reason it's not getting five stars is the buttons are a bit tricky. I should have gotten a duvet cover with a zipper. Overall, though, it was not difficult to put over the duvet. I got the white color and it's a lovely soft white. The whole bed looks more inviting.
customer_reviews.author: Ann B

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: My duvet cover came with an extra button leaving a wide gap where the duvet inside is visible, that’s the only reason I’m leaving 3 stars. I did check and recheck to make sure I hadn’t missed a button, but it just has an extra one. Otherwise an okay duvet cover for the price. It does collect pet hair immediately, I’ve slept on this 3 nights with my grey cat and the white cover is a magnet for her hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price, super soft
customer_reviews.text: I’m not the biggest fan of duvet covers In general because I feel they always have to be adjusted and it’s kind of annoying but still very happy with this one. It is very soft. Not super thick as others have mentioned, but that doesn’t bother us. The softness and price was the most important for us. It came clean with no stains and all buttons intact. Not sure how long the corner ties will last because they seem flimsy but we’ll see
customer_reviews.author: Conder1me

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and pet friendly!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this duvet cover, especially for the price. Bought it with the amazon choice duvet insert and was under $60 total for a super fluffy and soft comforter. The fabric of the duvet cover is super super soft and my dog absolutely loves to snuggle in it. Her nails don’t seem to be a problem which is a plus too. Only negative about it is that it is 90x90 and most inserts are 88x88, so you’ll have a bit of extra fabric once the insert is tied inside, but just tuck that in and it looks sooo nice! Also, you can’t see the insert stitching through the duvet cover!
customer_reviews.author: Karolynn Schneegas

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful well-made purchase... Happy and content in New York
customer_reviews.text: With all the negative reviews I had read before I purchase this I was very concerned.but I was pleasantly surprised when it arrived, it was in perfect condition ,the exact color I expected ,well made and absolutely as lovely as some of my high-end cotton duvets... Without the high-end price.. I am seriously considering purchasing more of these and other colors.. with some of the negative reviews I wondered if we were talking about the same product.. for those of you who are pondering this item take a chance it really is a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Annchapman

customer_reviews.title: Really nice duvet!
customer_reviews.text: It is a really fantastic quality of duvet, very light and airy but also warm. 😊 the pillow cases are really well designed, and the buttons on the duvet are sleek and easy to put together! I looove that these don’t unsnap during a wrestlers night’s sleep - they stay buttoned until you undo them! 😊 overall it really transforms the look of the bedroom and I couldn’t love it more! Just be cautious with food + stains with the white duvets, these don’t bleach well. 😭
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love!!! Color is as pictured. Material is surprisingly incredibly soft. Lays great on the bed. Doesn't snag, even when my dogs jump up. Love that it includes ties for your douvet inside, as well as multiple button closure at the bottom so your comforter doesn't start to pour out when you adjust it. Great price. Will be purchasing in two other colors :)
customer_reviews.author: Cbiv

product_meta.title: Nestl Bedding Duvet Cover 3 Piece Set – Ultra Soft Double Brushed Microfiber Hotel Collection – Comforter Cover with Button Closure and 2 Pillow Shams, White - Queen 90"x90"
feature_bullets: PREMIUM HIGH-QUALITY MATERIAL: Our hotel collection bedding set is woven from the highest quality microfiber material, double brushed on both sides for ultimate softness and comfort. Lightweight, breathable and cool to the touch, our luxuriously soft bedding will create a serene sleeping experience, leaving you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.

QUEEN SIZE: 3-piece set includes one duvet cover and two pillow shams. Queen size duvet cover measures 90” x 90” inches and includes button closure and string ties. Queen size pillow shams measure 20” x 26” inches with a 1.5” decorative flange and back overlap closure for an elegant, seamless look. Also available in California King, King, Full and Twin sizes.

ELEGANT AND VIBRANT: Slip this protective layer over your comforter, blanket or duvet insert instead of a top sheet. Useful and practical, the duvet cover secures with buttons and is easy to remove and wash. Our fabulous selection of vibrant colors won’t fade after washing and are a beautiful, elegant way to update your bedroom.

EASY CARE & CLEANING: Machine washable in cold water and tumble dry on low. Fade, stain, shrink and wrinkle resistant. Our sheets are wrinkle free with no ironing necessary, as well as hypoallergenic, environmentally friendly and resistant to dust.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Welcome to the Nestl Bedding family! Every purchase includes a 100% money-back satisfaction guarantee. Our #1 goal is to provide you with unparalleled customer service and we’re only happy if our customers are happy! Shop with confidence because no matter what, we’ve got you covered!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars23,579 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
